programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Night Fire

programme.title: Water Worlds

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Queen of the Ozarks

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E19, Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: One Tough Mother
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E18, In July 1997, the brutal murder of 19-year-old Tiffany Johnston rocks the small town of Bethany, Oklahoma. DNA points to her killer over a decade later and leads investigators across state lines.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E01, Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Dark Angel
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E14, 13 days after Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert. When a second victim is discovered in a mineshaft, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: A Family Cursed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E09, One family faces two unsolved murders of their loved ones. It takes thirteen years for detectives to uncover the one missing clue that can lead them to the killer: the hidden crime scene.

programme.title: Tao Of Rodney
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E14, Trying to preserve power by turning off all the non-essential systems the Ancients recently activated before being killed by the replicators, McKay mistakenly is hit by an energy beam from a mysterious device.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E15, Lorne discovers a planet with dozens of satellites in orbit. However, inhabitants on this planet are no further advanced than the renaissance and have a flag with McKay's face. The team realize a game they had found earlier might be more than a game.

programme.title: The Ark
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E16, Investigating an abandoned space station, McKay mistakenly brings one of its scientists out of stasis. The scientist explains to the team that the base was the last effort by his people to avoid the repeated culling they've endured by the Wraith.

programme.title: Sunday
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E17, With the entire city ordered to take a personal day the team does their best to unwind and enjoy their leisure time. Without warning a mysterious explosion rips through the city killing and injuring unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E18, The team searches the ocean for a mobile geothermal drilling station the ancients left dormant. Cautiously exploring the station, Teyla thinks she senses the presence of a Wraith. Weir, believing it's pressure affecting Teyla, has the team press on.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E19, After helping relocate the Taranans, the Atlantis team realizes they haven't heard from the village in a long period of time. It appears the Taranans have just abandoned their village until McKay detects life signs well beneath the surface.

programme.title: Visitation
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E09, With no recollection of how they got to the Destiny, crew members left behind over a year earlier make a mysterious return. After an unsettling turn, the memories stirred through regression therapy prove disastrous for those who’ve returned.

programme.title: Resurgence
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E10, In the hopes of finding something beneficial, the crew follows an energy signature that leads them to a mysterious sea of lifeless ships. With no visible signs of danger, the crew set off to take a closer look. But things may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E11, Locked in a battle with a Drone Command Ship, the Destiny is surprised by the arrival of the aliens that abducted Rush and Chloe. After Destiny's position is revealed, the crew again comes under heavy attack. But this time, they have a plan.

programme.title: Twin Destinies
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E12, Excitement spreads through the ship as Eli believes he’s found a way to dial Earth. But Dr. Rush has serious reservations about abandoning Destiny, and when the crew is interrupted by a distress call, it may just change the plans of the Destiny.

programme.title: Company Of Thieves
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E09, Lt. Col. Cameron Mitchell (Ben Browder) goes undercover to track down the Odyssey, which SG-1 believes was hijacked by the Lucian Alliance. Also starring Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E10, SG-1 finds the planet where they believe the Sangraal is. Forced to forge temporary alliances with Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and Ba'al (guest star Cliff Simon) they undertake a quest to find it. Starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Quest, The: Part II
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E11, Discovering the frozen body of Merlin (guest star Matthew Walker), SG-1 works to help him build the Sangraal before Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and her Ori army can track them down. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Line In The Sand
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E12, Hoping to use Merlin's phasing device to hide a village from the Ori army, something goes wrong forcing Mitchell (Ben Browder) and a critically injured Carter (Amanda Tapping) to hide themselves out of phase from an occupation of Ori soldiers.

programme.title: The Road Not Taken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E13, An experiment goes wrong leaving Lt. Colonel Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) trapped in a parallel reality where martial law has been enforced and Earth is under attack from the Ori. Also starring Ben Browder, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Shroud

programme.title: Home Is Where The Tart Is
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E01, Kelly returns from a modeling stint in New York. Donna enjoys her summer with Ray, who has made an effort to make up for his past mistakes.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E04, Donna, Kelly, Clare and Valerie try out for the Tournament of Roses Court. Brandon and Susan cover the Rose Court tryouts for the newspaper, and attend the party together. Toni surprises Dylan when they go motorcycle riding.

programme.title: Lover's Leap

programme.title: Speechless
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E06, Valerie gets herself invited on a road trip with Kelly, Donna and Clare. Steve convinces Brandon to let a director film a movie at the Walsh house. Marchette tells Toni that Dylan is using her.

programme.title: Beachblast

programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E07, CJ's mother, a former Las Vegas showgirl, arrives in town seeking CJ's help to get away from her mobster ex-boyfriend. When CJ and her mom are held hostage on a remote beach, it is up to Mitch and Cody to rescue them.

programme.title: Let the Games Begin
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E08, Australia's Uncle Toby's International Ironman Competition comes to LA. The Baywatch girls think all is fair in sports and convince the guys that they should compete as equals, setting the stage for a series of pranks between the men and women.

programme.title: Buried

programme.title: Heal the Bay

programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E12, Mitch has been chosen Flash Magazine's Bachelor of the Month, a designation that leads to wild complications. Stephanie is making plans for her wedding to Tom, but her sister Caroline keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Chance of a Lifetime
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E13, Stephanie and Tom go on their honeymoon in a two-mast schooner with a group of troubled teenagers, with Mitch and Neely along for help. All is going well until they get trapped in a hurricane and the ship starts sinking!

programme.title: Talk Show

programme.title: Life Guardian

programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E16, Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his home borough in East LA arrive at Baywatch for community service. Meanwhile, Neely suspects Mitch and Samantha are becoming more than coworkers.

programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E17, When a young couple’s romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives together rather than end their romance. Meanwhile, Cody encounters a mermaid while diving, and of course no one believes him… except CJ.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E18, While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash. They rescue the pilot, who reveals that he was transporting a canister that contains a deadly virus. Meanwhile, the team must shut down an illegal nude beach.

programme.title: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E19, Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbor’s newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?
